subject: Weather
Football
Super Bowl
Snow and Snowstorms
lead_paragraph: In voting to reward the Jets and the Giants with hosting Super Bowl XLVIII, N.F.L. owners sparked a host of prognostications, some of which call for Snowmaggedon on game day.
snippet: In voting to reward the Jets and the Giants with hosting Super Bowl XLVIII, N.F.L. owners sparked a host of prognostications, some of which call for Snowmaggedon on game day.
